H0.text: What was the name of painter van Gogh’s brother to whom he wrote many letters. Vincent

H1.text: What was the name of painter van Gogh’s brother to whom he wrote many letters. Paul

H2.text: What was the name of painter van Gogh’s brother to whom he wrote many letters. Johan

H3.text: What was the name of painter van Gogh’s brother to whom he wrote many letters. Theo

A4.text: Theo van Gogh was the brother of the painter Vincent van Gogh
